remarks: Lemma for ~ pexmidN .  Holland's proof implicitly requires ` q =/= r ` , which we prove here.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pexmidlem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pexmidlem.m $e |- M = ( X .+ { p } ) $.
pexmidlem1N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) /\ ( r e. X /\ q e. ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) -> q =/= r ) $.
